howiwork:
## How I Work

I'm currently enrolled in a UI design course where I'm learning key design concepts and best practices for creating intuitive, user-centered interfaces.

As part of the course, I explore:

- User-centered design
- Heuristic evaluation
- Information architecture
- Accessibility in design

Some resources I'm learning from:

- [NN/g: Nielsen Norman Group](https://www.nngroup.com/)
- [Course Materials on Brightspace](https://brightspace.uottawa.ca/)

As I continue learning, I'm excited to apply these concepts to real-world projects and evolve my design process further.
